charges.charge_description: 18:924(c), Using a Firearm During a Crime of Violence (4)

charges.charge_disposition: Ct S4, CBOP for SIXTY (60) MONTHS. Sentence to Run Consecutive to Cts S1 &; S2. FURTHER ORDERED that dft to serve a period of 36 months of supervised release (4)

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c), Using a Firearm During a Crime of Violence (3)

charges.charge_disposition: Jury verdict-not guilty on 6/28/90 as to Count S3 (3)

charges.charge_description: 18:111/1114, Assault on Federal Officer Using a Dangerous Weapon (1-2)

charges.charge_disposition: Count S1, CBOP for THIRTY-SIX (36) MONTHS, Count S2, CBOP for THIRTY-SIX (36) MONTHS. Sentence on Count S,S2 to run consecutively to each other. S/A: $150. RESENTENCE ON 4/12/93 AFTER REMAND FOR SENTENCE, As to Cts 1 and w of the lesser included offenses, CBOP for THIRTY-SIX (36) MONTHS on Count 1 and TWENTY-SEVEN (27) MONTHS on Count 2 for a total of SIXTY-THREE (63) MONTHS. Sentences on Counts 1 and 2 to run consecutively to each other. As to Count 4, CBOP for SIXTY (60) MONTHS, sentence to run consecutively to Counts 1 and 2. Dft is placed on thirty six months supervised release upon release from confinement, 1 year each on Counts 1 and 2 and three years on Count 3 to run concurrently with Counts 1 and 2. S/A: $150. Dft may be returned to the facility designated. (1-2)
